summary: The module supplies utilities for inspecting incoming HTTP requests to determine route characteristics such as pattern matches, required permissions, admin‑only status, and whether the endpoint corresponds to a language model API. These checks are used to enforce authentication and authorization policies throughout the LiteLLM proxy service.
business_intent: To secure the LiteLLM proxy by validating request routes against access control rules, ensuring only properly authenticated users—especially organization admins or users with SSO—can invoke privileged or LLM‑related endpoints.
